info.name: Bety-Plus API - Complete Collection
info.description:
Complete API documentation for Bety-Plus backend with all routes, required fields, and validation info.

## üìã **Field Requirements Legend:**
- ‚úÖ **Required** - Must be provided
- ‚ö†Ô∏è **Required for Booking** - Needed when user wants to book services
- üîß **Optional** - Can be omitted
- üìé **File Upload** - Multipart form data required
- üî¢ **Array** - Accepts multiple values

## üç™ **Authentication:**
- Uses HTTP-only cookies for authentication
- Login sets 'token' cookie automatically
- Postman automatically handles cookies between requests
- No manual Authorization headers needed
- Public routes are marked as such
- Admin routes require admin role

## üåç **Environments:**
- DEV_URL: http://localhost:3020
- API Base: {{DEV_URL}}/api/v1/v1

## üìù **Cookie Setup in Postman:**
1. After login, cookie is automatically set
2. Enable 'Cookie Jar' in Postman settings
3. Cookies persist across requests in same session

item.name: üîê Auth

request.description:
Login user and get JWT token

**Required Fields:**
- ‚úÖ email (string)
- ‚úÖ password (string)

üç™ **Authentication Required** - Uses cookies

Send password reset email

**Required Fields:**
- ‚úÖ email (string, valid email)

Reset password with token

**Required Fields:**
- ‚úÖ token (string, from email)
- ‚úÖ password (string, min 8 characters)

Change user password

üç™ **Authentication Required** - Uses cookies

**Required Fields:**
- ‚úÖ currentPassword (string)
- ‚úÖ newPassword (string, min 8 characters)

Logout user and invalidate token

üç™ **Authentication Required** - Uses cookies

Logout current user and clear authentication cookie

üç™ **Authentication Required** - Uses cookies

- ‚úÖ password (string, min 8 characters)
- ‚úÖ fullName (string, 2-100 characters)

üåç **Public Route** - Role automatically set to 'customer'

formdata.description: üî¢ Array of phone numbers - ‚ö†Ô∏è At least one required for booking (7-20 chars each)
‚ö†Ô∏è Required for booking - Passport/ID image URL

request.description:
Update user profile with image upload support

üç™ **Authentication Required** - Uses cookies (Customer role)

**Field Categories:**
- ‚ö†Ô∏è **Required for booking** - Needed when user books services
- üîß **Optional** - Can be omitted
- üìé **File upload** - Use multipart/form-data
- üî¢ **Array** - phoneNumber accepts multiple values

**Legacy Support:**
- primaryPhone & secondaryPhone still work (converted to phoneNumber array)

Get current user profile

üç™ **Authentication Required** - Uses cookies (Customer role)

Check if user profile is complete for booking

üç™ **Authentication Required** - Uses cookies (Customer role)

Checks these required fields:
- fullName
- phoneNumber (at least one)
- city
- area
- nationality

Delete user account (soft delete)

üç™ **Authentication Required** - Uses cookies (Customer role)

‚ö†Ô∏è **Warning:** This action cannot be undone

üóëÔ∏è **Automatic cleanup:** Profile images are deleted from Cloudinary

- ‚úÖ region (enum: 'UAE', 'Outside UAE')

Register new company account

**Required Fields:**
- ‚úÖ email (valid email format)
- ‚úÖ password (min 8 characters)
- ‚úÖ companyName (company name)
- üìé ‚úÖ commercialLicensePhoto (file upload)

**Default Values:**
- role: automatically set to 'company'
- image: default company image if not provided

Get current company profile

üç™ **Authentication Required** - Uses cookies (Company role)

formdata.description: üìé üîß Optional - New license photo (old one will be deleted)

request.description:
Update company profile

üç™ **Authentication Required** - Uses cookies (Company role)

**Auto-cleanup:** Old images are automatically deleted when new ones are uploaded

Delete company account

üç™ **Authentication Required** - Uses cookies (Company role)

‚ö†Ô∏è **Warning:** This will also delete all company workers

üóëÔ∏è **Cleanup:** All company and worker images deleted from Cloudinary

Create new worker for company

üç™ **Authentication Required** - Uses cookies (Company role)

**Required Fields:**
- üìé ‚úÖ pictureWorker (image file)
- ‚úÖ name (worker name)
- ‚úÖ specialization (service type)

**Optional Fields:**
- üìé üîß introductoryVideo (video file)

Get all workers for current company

üç™ **Authentication Required** - Uses cookies (Company role)

**Query Parameters:**
- page (number): Page number
- limit (number): Items per page

Get single worker details

üç™ **Authentication Required** - Uses cookies (Company role)

**URL Parameters:**
- workerId (string): Worker ID

formdata.description: üìé üîß Optional - New worker photo (old one deleted)

request.description:
Update worker information

**Auto-cleanup:** Old images/videos automatically deleted when new ones uploaded

**URL Parameters:**

üç™ **Authentication Required** - Uses cookies (Company role)

üóëÔ∏è **Cleanup:** Worker images and videos deleted from Cloudinary

**URL Parameters:**
- workerId (string): Worker ID

Get all available workers (PUBLIC)

üåç **Public Route** - No authentication required

**Query Parameters:**
- page: Page number
- limit: Items per page
- specialization: Filter by service type
- location: Filter by location

Get detailed worker information (PUBLIC)

üåç **Public Route** - No authentication required

**URL Parameters:**
- workerId (string): Worker ID

Get pricing quote for worker booking

üç™ **Authentication Required** - Uses cookies

**URL Parameters:**
- workerId (string): Worker ID

**Returns:**
- Pricing options for UAE/Outside UAE
- Deposit, full payment options
- Service details

Create payment session (Stripe)

üç™ **Authentication Required** - Uses cookies

**Required Fields:**
- ‚úÖ workerId (string): Worker ID
- ‚úÖ paymentType (enum): 'deposit', 'full', 'remaining'
- ‚úÖ amount (number): Payment amount
- ‚úÖ currency (string): Currency code (AED, USD, etc.)

**Payment Types:**
- deposit: Initial booking deposit
- full: Complete payment upfront
- remaining: Final payment after trial

Get remaining payment details after trial period

üç™ **Authentication Required** - Uses cookies

**URL Parameters:**
- depositPaymentId (string): Original deposit payment ID

**Use Case:** After user pays deposit and completes trial, get remaining amount

query.description: ‚úÖ Required - Stripe session ID from redirect

request.description:
Handle successful payment callback from Stripe

üåç **Public Route** - Called by Stripe

**Query Parameters:**
- session_id (string): Stripe session ID

**Note:** This is typically called automatically by Stripe after successful payment

Get user's payment history

üç™ **Authentication Required** - Uses cookies

**Query Parameters:**
- page: Page number
- limit: Items per page

**Returns:** List of user's payments with status, amounts, dates

Get pricing for specific region (PUBLIC)

üåç **Public Route** - No authentication required

**URL Parameters:**
- region (string): Region name (e.g., 'UAE', 'International')

**Use Case:** Display pricing to users before registration

Get pricing statistics and analytics (PUBLIC)

üåç **Public Route** - No authentication required

**Returns:** Average pricing, trends, regional comparisons

Get user notifications

üç™ **Authentication Required** - Uses cookies

**Query Parameters:**
- page: Page number
- limit: Items per page
- read: Filter by read status

Mark notifications as read

üç™ **Authentication Required** - Uses cookies

**Required Fields:**
- ‚úÖ notificationIds (array): Array of notification IDs to mark as read

Create new admin account

üç™ **Authentication Required** - Uses cookies (Admin role)

**Required Fields:**
- ‚úÖ email (string, valid email format)
- ‚úÖ password (string, min 8 characters)
- ‚úÖ fullName (string)
